Mistress Jade

—

I’m Sophia AKA Lion Mane AKA Mistress Jade…From Long Beach, California, but now live in Seattle and loving the PNW. Love to write poetry, dance, smoke da herbs, and making/growing things! BDSM and fetishism are a couple of my (not so) secret obsessions and I enjoy giving out spankings, floggings, and other punishments at camp. I’m looking forward to offering a haiku/literature workshop in the future. Let It Go was and always will be my home and I love our ever growing family!
